examples.translation: Your words hurt me a lot.

examples.text: Bugün sınav olduğunu fark ettiğimde okulu kırmaya karar verdim.
examples.translation: When I realised there was a test today, I decided to skip school.

etymology:
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish قیرمق (kırmak, “to break”), from Proto-Turkic *kïr-.
cognates
Cognate with Azerbaijani qırmaq, Turkmen gyrmak, Uzbek qirmoq, and Uyghur قىرماق (qirmaq).
